title: Bajaj Finance Offers Returns Up To 7.45% P.a. At A Minimum Deposit Of Rs. 15,000 | Mint - Mint
content: Bajaj Finance Offers Returns Up To 7.45% P.a. At A Minimum Deposit Of Rs. 15,000 | Mint  Mint
description: Nothing can beat the thrill of commanding finances to meet your pre-defined objectives. Investing in the only option that can serve your set wealth accumulation goals.
